resource.template: <#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_tree_cat(CAT_ID_,KEY_,NAME_,SN_,DESCP_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if CAT_ID_??>'${ CAT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if KEY_??>'${ KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${ DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_tree(TREE_ID_,CODE_,NAME_,PATH_,PARENT_ID_,ALIAS_,DESCP_,CAT_KEY_,SN_,DATA_SHOW_TYPE_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if TREE_ID_??>'${ TREE_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CODE_??>'${ CODE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${ PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_ID_??>'${ PARENT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ALIAS_??>'${ ALIAS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${ DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CAT_KEY_??>'${ CAT_KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if DATA_SHOW_TYPE_??>'${ DATA_SHOW_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${ APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_dic(DIC_ID_,TREE_ID_,NAME_,VALUE_,DESCP_,SN_,PATH_,PARENT_ID_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_ID_) values( <#if DIC_ID_??>'${ DIC_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TREE_ID_??>'${ TREE_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if VALUE_??>'${ VALUE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${ DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${ PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_ID_??>'${ PARENT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${ APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_app(APP_ID_,CLIENT_CODE_,CLIENT_NAME_,CATEGORY_ID_,ICON_,STATUS_,DESCP_,HOME_TYPE_,URL_TYPE_,LAYOUT_,PARENT_MODULE_,ICON_PIC_,HOME_URL_,SN_,PARAMS_,AUTH_SETTING_,IS_AUTH_,SHARE_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_,APP_TYPE_,PATH_) values( <#if APP_ID_??>'${ APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CLIENT_CODE_??>'${ CLIENT_CODE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CLIENT_NAME_??>'${ CLIENT_NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CATEGORY_ID_??>'${ CATEGORY_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_??>'${ ICON_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if STATUS_??>'${ STATUS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if DESCP_??>'${ DESCP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if HOME_TYPE_??>'${ HOME_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if URL_TYPE_??>'${ URL_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if LAYOUT_??>'${ LAYOUT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_MODULE_??>'${ PARENT_MODULE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_PIC_??>'${ ICON_PIC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if HOME_URL_??>'${ HOME_URL_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARAMS_??>'${ PARAMS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if AUTH_SETTING_??>'${ AUTH_SETTING_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if IS_AUTH_??>'${ IS_AUTH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SHARE_??>'${ SHARE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_TYPE_??>'${ APP_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${ PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>);

<#setting number_format="#">INSERT INTO sys_menu(MENU_ID_,APP_ID_,NAME_,ICON_PC_,ICON_PIC_,ICON_APP_,PARENT_ID_,PATH_,SN_,SHOW_TYPE_,MENU_KEY_,MENU_TYPE_,COMPONENT_,SETTING_TYPE_,BO_LIST_KEY_,PARAMS_,TENANT_ID_,CREATE_DEP_ID_,CREATE_BY_,CREATE_TIME_,UPDATE_BY_,UPDATE_TIME_) values( <#if MENU_ID_??>'${ MENU_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if APP_ID_??>'${ APP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if NAME_??>'${ NAME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_PC_??>E'${ ICON_PC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_PIC_??>'${ ICON_PIC_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if ICON_APP_??>'${ ICON_APP_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARENT_ID_??>'${ PARENT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PATH_??>'${ PATH_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SN_??>${ SN_}<#else>null</#if>, <#if SHOW_TYPE_??>'${ SHOW_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MENU_KEY_??>'${ MENU_KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if MENU_TYPE_??>'${ MENU_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if COMPONENT_??>'${ COMPONENT_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if SETTING_TYPE_??>'${ SETTING_TYPE_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if BO_LIST_KEY_??>'${ BO_LIST_KEY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if PARAMS_??>'${ PARAMS_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if TENANT_ID_??>'${ TENANT_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_DEP_ID_??>'${ CREATE_DEP_ID_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_BY_??>'${ CREATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if CREATE_TIME_??>'${ CREATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_BY_??>'${ UPDATE_BY_}'<#else>null</#if>, <#if UPDATE_TIME_??>'${ UPDATE_TIME_}'<#else>null</#if>);
